title: How to Change Quote's Costume in Cave Story for Wii

steps.headline: Open up the Cave Story Wii Channel.
At the title screen, hold down B and press 1,2,1,2,1,1,1,UP to change Quote's clothes blue.
At the title screen, hold down B and press 1,2,1,2,2 to change Quote's clothes to his traditional red.
At the title screen, hold down B and press 1,2,1,2,1,DOWN to change Quote to his yellow chicken suit.
At the title screen, hold down B and press 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, LEFT to change Quote to his Christmas costume (Quote has darker skin and a Santa hat.)
At the title screen hold down B and press 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, +, +, -, -, RIGHT to change Quote to his Halloween costume (Quote now wears black clothes and has red eyes.)

text: Open up the Cave Story Wii Channel.  At the title screen, hold down B and press 1,2,1,2,1,1,1,UP to change Quote's clothes blue.  At the title screen, hold down B and press 1,2,1,2,2 to change Quote's clothes to his traditional red.  At the title screen, hold down B and press 1,2,1,2,1,DOWN to change Quote to his yellow chicken suit.  At the title screen, hold down B and press 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, LEFT to change Quote to his Christmas costume (Quote has darker skin and a Santa hat.)  At the title screen hold down B and press 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, +, +, -, -, RIGHT to change Quote to his Halloween costume (Quote now wears black clothes and has red eyes.)
